statements: SELECT * FROM lab_test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC, test_result ASC
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_result > 50
SELECT test_name, test_date FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id = 101 ORDER BY test_date ASC
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_name FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_name LIKE '%blood%'
SELECT * FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_result FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_result > 50 ORDER BY test_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM lab_test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT test_name, AVG(test_result) AS avg_result FROM lab_test_results GROUP BY test_name HAVING avg_result > 70 ORDER BY avg_result DESC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(test_id) AS test_count FROM lab_test_results GROUP BY patient_id HAVING test_count >= 3 ORDER BY test_count DESC;
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_result, test_date FROM lab_test_results WHERE patient_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY patient_id, test_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patients WHERE patient_age >= 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result <> 'Negative' AND test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM TestResults WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM TestResults WHERE test_result > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researchers WHERE specialization = 'Biology';
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM TestResults ORDER BY test_result DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM TestResults WHERE test_result > 50 ORDER BY test_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT test_id, patient_id, test_name, test_result FROM TestResults JOIN Patients ON TestResults.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, specialization FROM Researchers WHERE specialization LIKE '%biology%' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT test_name, patient_id FROM lab_tests ORDER BY test_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 40;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers;
SELECT * FROM lab_tests WHERE test_result = 'Positive';
SELECT test_name, patient_id FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE researcher_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT test_id, test_result, patient_id FROM lab_tests WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male');
SELECT * FROM laboratory_tests;
SELECT test_id, test_name, patient_id FROM laboratory_tests WHERE test_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM test_orders GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM laboratory_tests WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM laboratory_tests WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY test_id DESC
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM laboratory_tests WHERE test_result LIKE '%negative%'
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty ASC, doctor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM test_orders JOIN patients ON test_orders.patient_id = patients.patient_id
